source folder.
Refresh the project containing the newly creating java files.

Got the dialog "Refresh Problems"

Reason: Errors during build

the Sun JDK 1.3.1 release...

Can't reproduce with Sun 1.4.1_01 VM. Happened to me a few times with the IBM 
1.3.1 jre.
Closing. Another JIT problem with the IBM VM.
